Rulings.Tengu:
●Sakuretsu Armor targets 1 monster.
●If the turn player chains Book of Moon to Sakuretsu Armor to flip the attacking monster face-down, then the attacking monster is not destroyed by Sakuretsu Armor.
Rulings.Goat:
●If both players have activated a “Royal Decree”, which “Royal Decree” would be in effect on the field? 
A: The most recent Royal Decree would be in effect. 
●Q: If “Royal Decree” is activated while both “Jinzo” and “Skill Drain” are on the field, what happens? A: As soon as Jinzo was able to do so he negated both face-up traps simultaneously. (right after Royal Decree resolved)
